Tom Cruise12:31 AM - Public 1983 ...again... Losin' it
It is a 1983 comedy film starring Tom Cruise, Shelley Long, Jackie Earle Haley, and John Stockwell. The film is directed by Curtis Hanson. It was filmed largely in Calexico, California.
Plot summary
Four teenagers from Los Angeles are on their way to Tijuana, Mexico: Dave, Woody, Spider, and Dave's brother Wendell. Dave, Spider, and Woody are there to lose their virginity, while Wendell came along with them to buy fireworks. They end up picking up a woman named Kathy, who goes with them because she wants a fast divorce from her husband, and they get into a series of misadventures south of the border.﻿

Tom Cruise*Actor Focus* Tom Cruise, is an American film actor and producer. He has been nominated for three Academy Awards and has won three Golden Globe Awards. He started his career at age 19 in the 1981 film Endless Love.
Born: July 3, 1962 (age 51) Syracuse, NY Height: 5' 7" (1.70 m)
Notable Movies and Performances #TopGun #RiskyBusiness #BornOnTheFourthOfJuly #RainMan #DaysOfThunder #Cocktail #Legend #FarAndAway #ColorOfMoney #MissionImpossible
